school.name: Secondary Modern School, Kelsey Language Institute

education.field_of_study: Accounting, program IBM 360-20, Trade Correspondent, Communication and Leadership

awards.title: Certificate of Completion.
awards.description: Successfully completed  the equivalent of four terms. Why this Certificate? Because only about 25% of those who start this Program do finish it. One has to have a clear goal, commitment, endurance. You have to be willing to lead by serving  others. It is by practice that one becomes a Teacher. You have to be Obedient, Humble and Faithful unto the Lord, amen. We measure this commitment in four basic areas: Religious, Scholastic, Community and Attendance.
awards.issuer: Mark S. LaChonce, Director Kelsey Arabic Program.

awards.title: Honor Standards of Achievement Fourth semester of Study.
awards.description:
Good News, Reading and Writing (Classical Arabic), Debate in Arabic, Communication, Media (Movie discussions, Newspaper Discussions), Bible Study ( Classical reading and Dialectic explanation), Bible Texts and Songs by memory, Public Speaking (Preaching and / or Teaching),  History of the Arabs and discussions, Abdo (History, Community and Politics).
The KAL certificate is issued to students who demonstrate a high level of commitment to studying Arabic during their whole semester with us. We measure this commitment in four basic areas: Religious, Scholastic, Community and Attendance.
awards.issuer: Mark S. LaChonce, Director of Kelsey Arabic Program.

awards.title: Honor Standards of Achievement in the Third semester of study.
awards.description:
Good News, Memorizing Words (Dialect) Text and Pages,  Reading and Writing (Classical Arabic), Communication, Bible Study ( Classical reading and Dialectic explanation ), Story telling for Sunday School Children. Abdo ( History, Community and Politics ).
The KAL certificate is issued to students who demonstrate a high level of commitment to studying Arabic during their whole semester with us. We measure this commitment in four basic areas: Religious, Scholastic, Community and Attendance.
awards.issuer: Mark S. LaChonce, Director of Kelsey Arabic Program.

awards.title: Perfect Attendance in the Fourth semester of study
awards.description:
Every hour, every minute, and every second of the study you have to be present, and always before and in time. As a real Commander in the Battle, amen! As Leader of the graduation class, you have to be there also for others. To direct the troops, hallelujah!
We measure this commitment in four basic areas: Religious, Scholastic, Community and Attendance.
awards.issuer: Mark S. LaChonce, Director of Kelsey Arabic Program.

awards.title: Academic Standards of Achievement Second semester of Study Kelsey Arabic Program
awards.description: Memorizing Words Amiyah ( Jordanian “spoken” Arabic[1] and Modern Standard Arabic[2]. We consider “Spoken” Arabic and M.S.A. to be two separate languages in terms of vocabulary, grammar, context of use and syntax.  , Reading Fustha ( Classical Arabic ) Communication, Abdo ( History, Community and Politics ). The K.A.L. certificate is issued to students who demonstrate a high level of commitment to studying Arabic. We measure this commitment in four basic areas: Religious, Scholastic, Community and Attendance.
awards.issuer: Imed, Director Study and Tests at Kelsey

profile_positions.title: Bookkeeper

profile_positions.description:
Numbers tell their story, and it has to be right.
The story has to agree, because numbers never lie....
In many of the own productions we made, some where sold others we kept for the company, with the vision to go into the airwaves. We had one good Editor, later we got another.
In the meantime, I assisted where I could.
Imaging in this case had to do with what your eyes see in the studio is not always right for television.
Camera, light and contrast, is a totally different story...
and it also has to agree, because we are aware that you are receiving us, in your living room. You are important, not only with the message you receive, but also in the way you receive it...with all respect.
I wrote some short stories. One was made into a short movie. One was "The Prophet and the stars"
profile_positions.title: Accounting, Assistant-Editor, Imaging & Short Stories

volunteer_experiences.description: Excellent, it is a worldwide experience. Prayer for the needy is an uttermost priority, and action trough faith. The results are out of this world, wonderful!!!
